    How it works

    HENTECH TECHNOLOGY offers a complete customer support operation on demand. We answer tickets for you, 18/5, while regularly training and improving our team.

    Respond fast to every customer

    Our team is highly trained and able to respond quickly to every customer enquiries, question or even complaints. The services that we provide, just as the way you train your customer service team, able to assist and consult your clients with opening accounts, deposits and withdrawals, and even consulting and after-sales services on your trading products. We have assisted our clients (MT4 / 5 brokers) in rapidly growing their business three times in a year, becoming a market leader in more than 100 countries. With a dedicated and scalable support team, you can focus more of your time on building your business.

    Respond quickly to each customer
